name: Space Gladiator (VStudiosCreations)
description:
Space Gladiator

Enemies are closing in, some right at your tail. Well, what are ya waiting for? Start shooting!

Fly in your ship in the circle, and destroy enemies before they destroy you! Collect powerups to help you survive longer! Upgrade your ship to blast more enemies! But beware: as time goes by, enemy numbers increase and grow more powerful.

So go ahead, get your blasters out. Shoot your enemies. Watch them explode. Become the greatest Space Gladiator.

Made by VStudios
